trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that defines an action to be executed if the associated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition*> evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions*>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe abstracta que define uma ação para ser executada se associada <> </> *> avalia como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, para <> </> *>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe tem de ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objects (which can be used as both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>objetos (que podem ser utilizados como ambos <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>), normalmente, defina um valor de variável numa das propriedades da atividade, chamar um método da atividade ou chamar os métodos estáticos em tipos em assemblagens referenciadas.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: RuleAction is the base type that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> classes derive from.
trans-unit.target: RuleAction é o tipo base que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>classes derivam.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: The uses of these classes is as follows: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza uma destas classes é o seguinte: - um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>modifica uma propriedade ou chama um método.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>para parar a execução e devolve controlo para o método de chamada.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>explicitamente indica que uma regra está a atualizar uma variável.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que a reavaliação de quaisquer regras afetadas.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> que é idêntica a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The runtime state that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is executing in.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução de estado que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> está a executar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os campos e propriedades atualizadas por um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that was used previously in a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> que foi utilizado anteriormente numa chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that represent the names of fields and properties that are changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de cadeias que representam os nomes dos campos e propriedades que são alteradas a um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> está configurado corretamente e não tem erros.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction>contém erros (o `Validate` método devolve `false`), em seguida, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>irá conter a lista de erros encontrados.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerir o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> validated correctly and has no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para mostrar que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> validado corretamente e não tem erros; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
